tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sonal Shah is absolute magic with Kids. My son's teeth are safe under her care. I recommend strongly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I cannot express enough how grateful I am to have found Dr. Sonal Trivedi for my 4-year-old daughter's full mouth rehabilitation during our brief visit to India. From the outset, our experience with Dr. Sonal was nothing short of extraordinary, and I am thrilled to share our heartfelt appreciation.
Our unique challenge of needing extensive dental work for my young daughter in two weeks seemed insurmountable until we found Dr. Sonal. She provided top-tier professionalism, expertise and compassion from the start, while coordinating the entire treatment plan remotely. She explained the procedure, timeline and what to expect thoroughly and patiently, leaving us feeling well-informed. Dr. organized appointments and treatment efficiently without compromising care quality. Meeting her in person, her warmth and genuine concern for my daughter's well-being, put us at ease. Her interaction with my daughter was heart-warming, creating a comfortable and trusting environment. Her skills, precision and ability to adapt to my daughter's temperament showcased her exceptional professionalism. The full mouth rehabilitation was a success thanks to her expertise and dedication. I cannot recommend her enough to parents seeking top-tier dental care for their children. Dr. Sonal thank you for making our visit to India both memorable and transformative. Your outstanding care and commitment to your patients has left a lasting impression on us, and we are immensely grateful for the positive impact on our daughter's dental health and overall well-being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dentist experience for a kid or adult both is something which we all want to avoid but it is unavoidable. 
We had a wonderful experience consulting Dr. Sonal Shah for my son. A very calm and composed doctor, She explained the diagnosis so well that it’s easy even for an uneducated person to understand the problem.

The clinic is maintained very well. Clean and hygienic.  
She has toys to engage kids and she engages the kid very well in the language you are comfortable with. 
She gave star badge and toothpaste as a goodie to make kid feel happy to behave well which my son slept with whole night remembering her and waiting to visit her.

She is a amazing in handling kids and she herself is a mother so its easier for parents to relate too. My 3year old needed some cavity fillings and we were a little worried about his as he is quite anxious and hyper. But Dr. Shah took care of him very well.
Her fees are also reasonable and goes by the basics of dental hygiene.

Since we visited her during Covid-19 pandemic, she had ensured highest precautions for our visit and we were more than happy to comply with her guidelines.

Dr. Sonal practices from 2 clinics - Andheri (east) and Andheri (west) and she sees to it that she is available as per your convenience at any of the clinics.

Dr. Sonal Shah is highly recommendable for kids with dental issues. Her simplicity and genuineness stands out. 

Great to know you Dr. Wish you Goodluck. 
Must say..if you get a chance do do visit her and there won't be a look back and disappointment.  Our kid would come out with a smile and a happy experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you Dr Sonal Shah and Dr Kaven Shah words are less to express. Was searching for a dentist for my son Shaun 8 yrs old for one year and finally found this.very very happy and satisfied with everything. The staff was all very cooperative n helpful. Don't know what I would had done if I wouldn't had found this clinic. All my years I grew up getting scared for dental treatment and so was my son but now he is all happy and look forward to go to the clinic. Would recommend everyone to go here. Dr Sonal treated my son like her own n took utmost care while and before n after the treatment. Thank you Thank you Dr Sonal Shah and Dr Kaven Shah . Words are less as I said . GOD BLESS YOU ABUNDANTLY. *** *** *** ***** **** **** **** AMAZING MAVERLOUS FABOULOUS...THANKS AGAIN...

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Hello Dr.sonal ...Thank you for being a truly spectacular dentist. I am filled with gratitude that you are always eager to readily help me out whenever I need it. My child  felt completely safe with you in charge.In this pandemic when no body was ready to help when My child was in great tooth pain and you gave your precious time and gave him his fillings....You are really so good at your job, and for being just as good with how you treat kids.I want to express my gratitude to you and your staff for all the amazing work that you have done for my child . Thank you for your efforts and time. It really means a lot to me.....actually thanks is really small word for you ....may God give you all happiness in your life .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We visited Dr. Sonal Shah for  our 3.5 yo daughter who was showing signs of dental cavities. We also wanted to do a first dental checkup for her. Dr. Sonal Shah was so good with my child and she ensured that my child is absolutely at ease in the environment and that is crucial when dealing with kids. She is thorough in her diagnosis and her explanations are simple to understand and detailed. I was very happy with her recommendations, treatment and will definately continue consulting with her for any future concerns with my daughter's dental health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
A big Thank you to Dr. Sonal for treating my son's dental issues. Quite happy about the entire procedure including the healthy tips shared. The approach is very professional yet quite friendly. My son is no more making fuss about visiting dentist clinic which was not the case earlier. 
Making her patients quite comfortable is one of the good things we observed. 
The hygiene is up to the mark given the current situation especially for young kids. 
Would certainly recommend all the parents who are still in doubt and delaying the visit to Dentist for their children. In my experience timely treatment and regular checks will keep the big problems away.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was a wonderful experience consulting Dr. Sonal Shah for both my kids. She explained the diagnosis so well that it’s easy even for an uneducated person to understand the problem.

She is a master in handling kids, my 5 year old needed some cavity fillings and we were a little worried about his patience. But Dr. Shah took care of him so well that we didn’t even realise when the treatment was completed. Her fees are also reasonable and goes by the basics of dental hygiene. 

Since we visited her during Covid-19 pandemic, she had ensured highest precautions for our visit and we were more than happy to comply with her guidelines.

Dr. Shah practices from 2 clinics - Andheri (east) and Andheri (west).

All in all, Dr. Sonal Shah is highly recommendable for kids with dental issues. Her simplicity stands out. *** ** *** **** **** ** **** **** **** ****** ***

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We were spectacle at first place as my daughter was only 2years old and was about to go for root canal process but Dr.Sonal explained us everything so nicely and was so gentle with our daughter that we gained the confidence to go ahead for the root canal procedure. Dr. Sonal is an excellent doctor and really very good and humble person , she is very friendly too , she patiently listen to parents queries and also answer the same very politely & also handles the kids very nicely .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Amazing would be an understatement when i speak about Dr. Sonal. What an amazing displayof child psycology n behaviour. One has to visit her to experience that level of empathy n understanding.
 I cant thank her enough the way she did Root canal for my 4 year old son. He always came out smiling after all sessions. Also no unreasonable unfair charges.

review:
I can't believe that root canal treatment in kids can be fun. I personally get scared of dental treatment so didn't have the courage to take my child. But Dr.Sonal did that magic of changing this experience.
She explained it very nicely & made is so easy for my kid that he didn't realise what was done.
Even the other kids at her clinic were happily enjoying their time.

Dr.Sonal is also my childhood friend & I feel very proud to see her at this position. 
Thanks a lot Dr.Sonal !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
It was for my daughter, problem was cavity and the way Dr. Sonal had explained us was very depth and good for own knowledge and big plus is she is friendly with the kids as I was worried how my kid will react. 

But all good. Completely satisfied with treatment provided.

Whoever read this note, pls be assured doctor is well experienced and you won't regret.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

I know my daughter will be comfortable henceforth and I would definitely recommend her for kids, especially those who are anxious with treatments.

Very happy with my time at Smile Sensations Dental Clinic. The whole team from the receptionist to the dental assistants and the Drs are very polite and extremely professional.
I visited for a dental checkup and a teeth-cleaning treatment.
Dr. Sonal K Shah was very kind and explained the entire process very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr sonal shah and dr kavin shah both are really very nice and warm. We were searching for pediatric dentist for our son who is very sensitive n afraid of doctors. And we are really fortunate that we got Dr sonal shah ,who is very friendly n expert in handling children. She first made my child comfortable by explaining n treating very friendly n then removed his teeth comfortably.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sonal is Child friendly. It's only when the child is  comfortable & happy will she start treatment. My son has been visiting her since he was 7 years old. We now visit regularly for Preventive tests. She was the one who introduced us to Preventive treatment when my son still had his milk tooth. Highly recommended.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: I really appreciate the way Dr. Sonal Shah treats the children...She makes the child feel so very comfortable in the environment that child comes with a smiley face even after their dental surgery ****** ** *** **** ********* ****** ** *** ** ********** **** Will surely recommend .

review:
Dr. Sonal was excellent at handling my son who is 3yrs old.
I was procrastinating his dental check as I could not get him to sit on the chair but Dr. Sonal was so patient and friendly and got him to co-operate and get the check up done followed by the treatment so seamlessly.

She is very professional and gives viable solutions which are necessary and can help increase the life of the tooth. Also pocket friendly.

I will definitely recommend her for little ones.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: **** **** ****** **** positive attitude. The best in handling kids. There were 5 to 6 teeth that needed filling for which she patiently handled my 4yrs daughter making her sit independently and my daughter too enjoyed the settings.  Had a best experience. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got some cavity fillings done from Dr Sonal which were absolutely painless. My fear for dentist went away after getting treatment from her. Followed by which I required teeth straightening which was done by Dr Kavin, and now I am so happy with my smile and appearance. My appointments were well managed by their humble staff. Thankyou so much Dr Sonal and Dr Kavin for bringing a great confidence in me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

Had done Root Canal treatment for my 4 yrs old princess and she was perfectly okay for all the 3 sittings.Highly recommend Dr Sonal.. Thanks.

Will highly recommend Doctor for Kids.

The most defining statement I can make about this patient doctor relationship is the eagerness my daughter exhibits each time she has a dental appointment. Also with Dr. Sonal's guidance I can relax that my daughter's oral hygiene habits are well formed.

She is an excellent doctor and an adorable human being.
Explains the situation clearly and suggests the best options.
My child is very fond of her as she doesn't let the child even realize about the treatment the are undergoing....
Big Thanks to her...
Highly recommended to all Parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Our experiance was great! Dr Sonal's passion  for her profession is evident when she very patiently informs the kid about the entire  procedure which the kid is going to undergo,this makes the child very comfortable and  happily agrees for the procedure. Would definitely recommend her for her experience in handling the pediatric patients.
My feedback would definitely stand incomplete without the mention of the excellent maintenance of  cleanliness and hygiene  of the clinic.
Thanks!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very satisfied with the clinic and in particular the pediatric dentist Dr Sonal Shah. She is absolutely fantastic with kids, and took a lot of time and effort to explain in detail the procedures and processes involved in fixing my 7 year old daughters dental issues (which involved filings, deep filings and root canals with a metal cap in milk teeth). Changes in my availability were also promptly and conviniently accommodated(we were in Mumbai for a short visit). Whilst in the waiting area I conversed with several other parents of children coming from far away suburbs too, who were her patients, who had only good things to say about Dr Shah.

Thank you Dr Sonal Shah.

Regards 
Adrian

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
When I first visited Dr. Sonal with my 3 year old son, I was not too optimistic about the outcome.

(Having visited his earlier dentist several times without success - he was very uncooperative and in fact refused to even enter the clinic, leave alone sit on the chair. And since he was in terrible pain for months, we were told that general anaesthesia is the only option - and this had been causing us a great deal of stress.)

However, within minutes of being with Dr. Sonal, my son took to her instantly - and miraculously, after a couple of brief interactions - sat for treatment willingly and with a smile on his face. My son also loved the talks they would have and really looked forward to his visits.

I would rate Dr. Sonal as EXCELLENT on every parameter - be it friendliness, service, professionalism, and most importantly, patience.

Thank You, Dr. Sonal!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sonal is wonderful with kids. I had been there for my 4year old daughter. She is very friendly with kids and her treatment procedure is just superb. Though it's on the expensive side, but it's really worthy. Following things I would like to share about her:1. In the first session, she checked her and described the problem in details.2. She was also available on phone, very few doctors share there number and are available on phone also. 3.She did 2root canals and despite of we being scared that how our daughter will make it, Dr sonal handled it perfectly well. Mishika (my daughter) even didn't realize when was the injection injected.  So I am happy with her treatment, and would recommend Dr. Sonal.

review: Very patient and practical in her approach. Excellent paediatric dentist and is able to connect with the kids well. Takes time to understand them and explain things in a way that even kids understand and don’t feel scared. Visited with my 7 year old and quite satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My daughter Tishya was not ready for her Teeth fillings. But due to the courteous efforts of the Doctor and taking my daughter into confidence, She was ready for it. I really appreciate the Doctor's patience when treating children of small age groups. Really appreciate it.  Thank you soo much for the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: very very nice doctor...1st of all she will make a nice bond with kid and then she start treatment...kids also become very friendly with her..she will explain all the situation very well and tell u everything what to do and what not to, to maintain a healthy teeth in your kids... amazing experience and 100 percent recommend ed....🙂👍👍👍👍👍

review:
She magically make a child her friend prior to treatment. 
It's  unbelievable  that the child who refuses to access her mouth just for a visible inspection helps doctor in all way for full mouth inspection and checkup. 
This transformation  is due to the friendly and trustworthy bonding between Dr Sonal and her little  patients.
Rate 10+ out of 10.
